pageContext.claim: “He [Michael Cohen] was in another business totally unrelated to me, where I guess there was fraud involved and loans and taxicabs and all sorts of things -- nothing to do with me -- because he had an outside business. He worked for me, you could really say was more or less part time.”
pageContext.analysis: Cohen held the title of executive vice president of the Trump Organization, so "more or less part-time" is not correct.
